info.title: EV_SCMMS API
info.description: EV Service Center Maintenance Management System API

post.summary: Authenticate user with email and password

requestBody.description: Login credentials containing email and password
Registration data including user details and credentials

post.summary: Create a new staff member (Admin only)

requestBody.description: Staff creation data including role specification

post.summary: Refresh JWT access token using refresh token

requestBody.description: Refresh token request containing the refresh token and access token
Revoke token request containing the refresh token

post.summary: Revoke all refresh tokens for current user (logout from all devices)

get.summary: Get current user information from JWT token
Comprehensive health check including database and system info
Get spareparts by vehicle model ID
Get spareparts by price range - TODO: Implement in service
Get active spareparts - TODO: Implement in service
Get all replenishment requests with pagination
Get all usage histories with pagination
Get usage histories by sparepart ID
Get usage histories by center ID
Get usage histories by date range
Get usage histories by vehicle ID
Get usage statistics for a sparepart

put.summary: Update an existing user work schedule assignment
put.description:
Optional fields:
- Status: Assignment status (e.g., "Active", "Cancelled", "Completed")
- IsActive: Boolean flag for soft delete

get.summary: Get user work schedules within a date range
get.description:
Useful for calendar views and schedule planning.
Returns all shifts (Morning, Evening, Night) for the user in the specified period.

post.summary: Create a new user work schedule assignment
post.description:
Required fields:
- UserId: GUID of the technician/user
- CenterId: GUID of the service center
- Shift: Must be one of: "Morning", "Evening", "Night"
- WorkDate: Date for the work schedule (YYYY-MM-DD format)

Shift times:
- Morning: 07:00 - 12:00
- Evening: 13:00 - 19:00
- Night: 20:00 - 06:00 (next day)

post.summary: Bulk assign multiple technicians to the same work schedule
post.description:
Required fields:
- CenterId: GUID of the service center
- Shift: Must be one of: "Morning", "Evening", "Night"
- WorkDate: Date for the work schedule (YYYY-MM-DD format)
- TechnicianIds: Array of technician GUIDs to assign

Shift times:
- Morning: 07:00 - 12:00
- Evening: 13:00 - 19:00
- Night: 20:00 - 06:00 (next day)

Returns:
- successfulAssignments: List of successfully assigned technicians
- failedAssignments: List of failed assignments with error details
- totalProcessed, successCount, failureCount: Summary statistics

post.summary: Automatically assign available technicians to a work schedule
post.description:
Required fields:
- CenterId: GUID of the service center
- Shift: Must be one of: "Morning", "Evening", "Night"
- WorkDate: Date for the work schedule (YYYY-MM-DD format)
- RequiredTechnicianCount: Number of technicians needed (1-50)

Optional fields:
- RequiredSkills: Array of required skill names (not implemented yet)

Shift times:
- Morning: 07:00 - 12:00
- Evening: 13:00 - 19:00
- Night: 20:00 - 06:00 (next day)

System will automatically find and assign available technicians.

Bearer.description:
Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your valid token in the text input below.

Example: "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..."
